UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Hubert Elihue WATSON, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. No. 29897. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 1, 1971. *1128Ralph C. Dell (Court-appointed), Allen, Dell, Frank & Trinkle, Tampa, Fla., for defendant-appellant, John L. Briggs, U. S. Atty., Hugh N. Smith, Asst. U. S. Atty., Tampa, Fla., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before JOHN» R. BROWN, Chief Judge, and PHILLIPS* and INGRAHAM, Circuit Judges.

Of the Tenth Circuit, sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir., 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
